ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was waiting for you to come!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s learn about Pokémon together again.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0701_01_10:
I’m looking up all sorts of things about Trainers
and Gyms from different regions.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0701_02_10:
If I want to win the PML, I have to learn 
as much as I can from old documents.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0701_03_10: Humans are creatures of learning, after all!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0702_01_10:
There are all sorts of things in history—both
big and small.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0702_02_10:
Even small things are important. For example,
our meeting will go down in history.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_01_10:
There are Geodude all over the world, but
many of them are in the Kanto region.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_02_10:
Those Geodude evolve into Graveler and then
into Golem after that.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_03_10: I always wanted to be a Trainer of a Golem.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_04_10:
In fact, one of my goals as a young child 
was to train a Golem.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0702_01_10: Even a small Pokémon can grow big and strong.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0702_02_10:
Being able to see that moment is another perk
that comes with being a Trainer!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_01_10:
Boulders, fossils, and minerals—aren’t they
all wonderful?
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_02_10: Just looking at them gets me excited!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_03_10: These were here before I was born...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_04_10:
and they will be here for a long time after.
They’re unbudging, absolute objects.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0702_01_10:
Even a rock can be as beautiful as a jewel
or the stars in the night sky.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0702_02_10:
But you have something that shines just
as brightly...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0702_03_10:
Your passion. That hot, burning passion is
something that every Trainer should have.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0701_02_10: Her firm stance, her well-featured face...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0701_03_10:
She is absolutely beautiful, like an avatar of
beauty itself.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0701_04_10:
She is not flashy, but her rugged look is what
makes her so beautiful.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0702_01_10:
I want Nosepass to make her mark on a shiny
stage one day, too.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0702_02_10: Because Nosepass is still a gem in the rough!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_01_10:
You can see a Trainer’s preference even in
something as simple as a battle.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_02_10: I like battles when I can predict the outcome.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_03_10: But what I like even more are...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_04_10:
battles with you for which no amount of studying
could ever prepare me for!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_05_10:
Those battles get so hot that we could
melt boulders!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0702_01_10:
I have so many things I can learn from battles
with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0702_02_10:
I just hope that you have something that you
can learn from them, too.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0701_01_10:
I got you a present as a reward for all of your
hard work!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0701_02_10:
Think well of how to use it. It can become
anything from exactly what you need to
completely worthless, depending on you.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0702_01_10:
Even if you study up on it, you won’t know how
to use it properly until you actually use it.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0702_02_10:
In whatever you do, there’s informational
knowledge and practical knowledge that you
have to consider.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0701_01_10: Do you like to study? I absolutely love it!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0701_02_10:
The more I learn, the more I feel that
I am polishing myself...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0701_03_10:
very much like a rock being polished into a gem,
and I love that feeling.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_01_10: I don’t need a break! I love to learn.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_02_10: But I do want to learn more about Pasio.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_03_10:
Rumors say that there are buildings with fossils
in the walls...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_04_10: Uh, no! It’s nothing. Forget I said anything!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_01_10:
Would you like to study with me?
The romantic secrets of the rocks?
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_02_10:
For example, the fossils buried in the walls...
Even living creatures become rocks!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_03_10:
Learning is wanting to know more.
That is what is important.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_04_10:
Let’s study the mysteries of Rock-type
Pokémon together!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_01_10:
To be able to talk with me this much...
Are you, by chance, a rock maniac like me?
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_02_10: How splendid! Please be my rock pal!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_03_10:
I have to introduce you to Steven, too!
He’s also my rock pal!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_04_10:
Please come by the Rustboro Gym sometime 
and battle me! 
We’ll use our best Rock-type Pokémon!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3001_0701_01_10:
Hello! Using the morning to plan your day
is always a good idea.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3002_0701_01_10:
Waking up early always makes me feel like
something good will happen.
Like...maybe finding a rare stone!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3003_0701_01_10:
Afternoon! I prefer to get my chores done early
in the day. It helps keep things efficient!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3004_0701_01_10:
I always get a bit sleepy in the afternoon.
If I’m not careful, I... *yawn*
I might not be able to stop yawning.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3005_0701_01_10:
Hello! I suppose it’s time to rest for the night.
I hope you had a productive day!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3006_0701_01_10:
If you push yourself too hard in the evening,
it’ll affect how you feel the next day.
Make sure to set aside some time to rest.
